fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Abundance: Your hand limit is 6 cards.
- Brewery: Whenever you empty your hand the first time, immediately refill it.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Heal: Play a Reforged Heal! or Reforged Cleanse! on someone. [2 uses, 1 CD]
- Reform: Apply Reforge or Satchel to a card. [4 uses, 1 CD]
- Brew: Discard 3 cards. Gain a random special card. [2 uses, 4 CD]
- Recast: Pick two cards in your hand. Discard them and draw 2 cards. [Infinite uses, 2 CD]
